urls.title: President Trump said people with coronavirus "go to work" and now critics on Twitter are furious
urls.description: Mr. Trump later claimed "I NEVER said people that are feeling sick should go to work," calling it "just more Fake News."

text:
@JohnCornyn @VP @GovAbbott "During a Wednesday night interview with Fox News, President Trump said he believes people infected with the novel coronavirus may get better "by sitting around and even going to work."
https://t.co/yn6qnPCZxB
